title: Convert email to event or task
creator: stefanjan
content:
I've been using Thunderbird on desktop for some time.

Just installed Thunderbird on my Android phone, I can't find the organise, convert to event / task setting.

Is this not available?

title: Password problem
creator: mw33
content:
Hi Mozilla-Team, Leider funktioniert mein Passwort für Thunderbird nicht mehr, was gestern noch ging. Ich versuche gerade meine E-Mails vom PC aufs Handy zu verbinden. Beides ube Thunderbird, bzw. die App dazu. Könnt ihr mir bitte helfen? Vielen Dank und herzliche Grüße, Marianne

Unfortunately, my Thunderbird password no longer works, even though it worked yesterday. I'm trying to connect my emails from my PC to my phone. I use Thunderbird, or rather the app, for both. Can you please help me? Thank you and best regards, Marianne

title: mpossibile inviare alcuni messaggi IllegalStateException: No outbox_state
creator: Gambalunga
content:
I am getting the following notification: Thunderbird Beta 21:29 > mpossibile inviare alcuni messaggi IllegalStateException: No outbox_state entry for message with id 7

Tapping on the notification opens the app but does not give any further indication. I have checked all email account settings and I did find one which seemed to not have the password for the SMTP but after inserting the correct password I was able to send mail. I have tried deleting the cache and I have sent test emails from all accounts. Any ideas anyone?
